unnormalised: Cybersecurity firm, SecurIT, alerted users today about a massive phishing campaign targeting SBI customers. The attackers are sending out SMS messages claiming there's an issue with the user's account and urging them to update their KYC details immediately. The link in the SMS redirects to a fake SBI website that looks almost identical to the real one.
